hellpeon laughed as the flames were sent away by the chachitan energy 
around him that began to glow even brighter. He sent another mental 
message to Darkfate.

Hellpeon: "I am not able to hold back any longer your men must leave 
now or they will be destroyed..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> The floor melted away exposeing the base's remaining fuel in 
the "gas tank." the fumes rose almost immediately catching fire from 
the heat from the Chaotican energy. The first fuel tank exploded 
catching Hellpeon in the middle of it. The blaze started a chain 
reaction, next the second, then third, within moments all five fuel 
tanks were ablaze along with the entire lower levels of the Trainer 
base. flames creapt up every line connected, without the computers 
control of the cut offs there was nothing to control the flames, if 
they reached the engine and ignited the other power systems there'd 
be nothing left of the base or anything that remained within fifty 
miles of it.
